title: Acapulco Diamante
description: Acapulco Diamante is the city’s most modern and exclusive area, home to luxury resorts, golf courses, and pristine beaches. A perfect destination for travelers seeking comfort, style, and relaxation by the Pacific Ocean.

title: Papagayo Park
description: Papagayo Park is a green oasis in the heart of Acapulco, featuring gardens, recreational areas, and cultural spaces. It’s the perfect spot to enjoy a family outing surrounded by nature and history.

title: La Quebrada
description: La Quebrada is Acapulco’s most iconic attraction, famous for its daring cliff divers who leap from heights of up to 35 meters into the ocean. It’s a breathtaking spectacle that captures the adventurous spirit of Acapulco.
